title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
EB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should not be enabled if the build is already done automatically.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Java perspective
2. Right-click on any file or project
3. Observe that the "Build" action is always enabled in the context sensitive popup menu
